In Valley awful cafees, garden & chocolate museum awaits u after many houres of long riding (during wich u can feel sick). Ya, mountains r beautiful, but sooo many houres by car not worth to go

Goverment should maintain this area, cause is Rubbish Valley & shame that such condition!!!

Overhyped train that gets late , takes much more time than road , hardly any scenic views , all views obstructed by long bushes , just tunnels after tunnels and nothing else. 

Except for Borra caves there is nothing worth visiting for a single day trip.

Add to this is the third grade non standard unhygienic food that is available.

AP tourism is so bad - came to know only after visiting this place.

Mar 2024 • Family

I had heard a lot about this place. So I made a visit to this ‘hill station’ in end Mar 24. I was disturbed by the levels of ecological devastation perpetrated on the place in the name of development. 

Mindless, unplanned and unaesthetic construction, which is blatantly incongruous in the setting can be seen everywhere. Umpteen road widening and bridge building projects, which must undoubtedly have been preceded by rampant tree felling of indigenous forest trees, also blight the landscape. 

The air is saturated with dust. And if one is hoping for a respite from the sweltering heat and pollution pf Visakhapatnam, then I am sorry to say, your hopes are going to be dashed.
